name: Fluid and Destruction Simulator Lite
description:
Fluid and Destruction Simulator Lite is a physics-based game demo that features, shatter physics, soft body physics, real time fluid simulation and customization, structural integrity, and much more!

The player to destroy objects and structures in millions of ways. The objects that you destroy are collapsible and respond to the environment around them.

This simulator is a smaller version with less content than "Ultimate Destruction Simulator" which will be released on Steam this Summer which may include 50+ soft body, liquid, and Destruction simulations plus a sandbox editor where you can customize a scene plus change liquid compositions.

This game demo Contains 8 simulations that features Realtime Fluid Simulation, Fracturing, Destruction, Soft body Physics, and a mixed mode.

Adjust quality settings to adjust to your PC specs.

This game will help fund the full version on Steam! Your support and feedback will help me with the full version.
